turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I ordered some starbucks, should be ready before you even get there. You fly I'll buy?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds great, I think I just passed it though, which location did you order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nah, I picked the one down on Market Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ha ha, funny. Why would you pick the only star bucks in this city that doesn't have a drive thru?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like their sign.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The Pikes Plake Market sign?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, the starbucks sign!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Aren't they all the same?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yup, with that one exception.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me guess, you drew a mustache on the mermaid?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Laughs. 2 mocha frappachinos' extra shot of exresso with whipped cream and white chocolate on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Nice, they give you a confirmation number?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Of course, probably in a text I just ignored. What are you picking up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Starbucks!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you want to drive back to starbucks because you were too distracted by the sign to verify the order was correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No ma'am. 2 mocha fraps, extra shot, whipped and white shavings.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, forwarding the receipt now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My apologies and thank you. Awesome your trying my favorite today.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds a bit girly, but also delicious, I"ll give it a shot!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A double shot! So what's up with the sign?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's the original starbucks store, still prouding flying their original sign before they had to change repeatedly to make each country happy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Interesting.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It is! Click
